    • Method Detail

      • getCampaigns

        ResultSet<EmailCampaignResponse> getCampaigns(java.lang.String accessToken,
                                            java.lang.Integer limit,
                                            java.lang.String modifiedSinceTimestamp)
                                              throws ConstantContactServiceException
        Gets all the Email Campaigns.
        Implements the get Campaigns operation of the Email Campaign API by calling the ConstantContact server side.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
        limit - The limit
        modifiedSinceTimestamp - This time stamp is an ISO-8601 ordinal date supporting offset. It will return only the Email Campaigns modified since the supplied date.
        Returns:
        A ResultSet of EmailCampaignResponse containing data as returned by the server on success;
        An exception is thrown otherwise.
        Throws:
        ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

      • getCampaign

        EmailCampaignResponse getCampaign(java.lang.String accessToken,
                                java.lang.String campaignId)
                                  throws ConstantContactServiceException
        Gets a single Email Campaign.
        Implements the get Campaign operation of the Email Campaign API by calling the ConstantContact server side.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
        campaignId - Id of the Email Campaign to get
        Returns:
        An EmailCampaignResponse containing data as returned by the server on success;
        An exception is thrown otherwise.
        Throws:
        ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

      • addCampaign

        EmailCampaignResponse addCampaign(java.lang.String accessToken,
                                EmailCampaignRequest emailCampaign)
                                  throws ConstantContactServiceException
        Adds a single Email Campaign.
        Implements the add Campaign operation of the Email Campaign API by calling the ConstantContact server side.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
        emailCampaign - The Email Campaign to add
        Returns:
        An EmailCampaignResponse containing data as returned by the server on success;
        An exception is thrown otherwise.
        Throws:
        ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

      • updateCampaign

        EmailCampaignResponse updateCampaign(java.lang.String accessToken,
                                   EmailCampaignRequest emailCampaign)
                                     throws ConstantContactServiceException
        Updates a single Email Campaign.
        Implements the update Campaign operation of the Email Campaign API by calling the ConstantContact server side.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
        emailCampaign - The Email Campaign to update; match is done by id on server-side
        Returns:
        An EmailCampaignResponse containing data as returned by the server on success;
        An exception is thrown otherwise.
        Throws:
        ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

      • deleteCampaign

        boolean deleteCampaign(java.lang.String accessToken,
                     java.lang.String emailCampaignId)
                       throws ConstantContactServiceException
        Deletes a single Email Campaign.
        Implements the delete Campaign operation of the Email Campaign API by calling the ConstantContact server side.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
        emailCampaignId - Id of the Email Campaign to delete
        Returns:
        true on success;
        An exception is thrown otherwise.
        Throws:
        ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.
